metadata.name: Bauhausschule 001
metadata.description:
Bauhausschule Series â€“ drawing from design catalogues and architectural illustrations from the Bauhaus period (1919 - 1933). This series sees the artist take creative liberty, dreaming up new buildings while drawing from Bauhaus foundations of colour, form and design.


Digital. High Resolution JPG | 6000px x 4343px
Plot. On request you will receive a 1 of 1 plot of this artwork (A2 | 42 x 59.4 cm | 16.5in x 23.4in).
